io.fries.reflection.scanners

Class ClassPathScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fries.reflection.scanners.ClassPathScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scanner

    public final class ClassPathScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scanner
    Scan the resources of a ClassLoader's classpath and store their simple metadata.
    Since:
    1.0
